      living can be more challenging and therefore more interesting

      cool it down

      i check them at 1.5x and .5x

      danque

      i'd say about 20 degrees

      to challenge you

      no

5.8.23  2:54 am   Did you know that in the early days of garfield Jon had a roomate named Lyman and he is the reason odie is in the comic (because odie is his dog) but after like a year or two he was slowly phased out of the comic because jim davis thought he was unnecessary

      yes i knew that

5.8.23  2:54 am   how did "is cereal a soup" become a meme on this page

      i assume it became a meme in the wider world

5.8.23  12:34 am   Is this the first question in June?

      no

5.7.23  11:41 pm   Do you have any inspirations for your music?

      yes. everything inspires music

5.7.23  10:50 pm   how do i do the things that i want to do without being distracted by all the other things that i can do

      you'll need some kind of sensitive weighing device, to balance them

5.7.23  10:07 pm   Can you prime factor 5040 please

      sure. drop the zero is 504, in half is 252, in half is 126, in half is 63, which is 9x7, so you have 9x7 x 2x5 x 2x2x2 so to rearrange it into the final answer, it's 2x2x2x2x3x3x5x7

5.7.23  9:41 pm   opinion on rocks?

      very lively

5.7.23  8:20 pm   If you wrote a movie, what would it be about?

      i'd have to write 10 or 100 movies to figure that out. that's why writing just 1 would be fairly uncomfortable for me

5.7.23  8:11 pm   What's your opinion on possums?

      very lively

5.7.23  7:59 pm   what is the nature of nature

      very natural

5.7.23  7:32 pm   whats your opinion on perfect pitch

      it's a misleading concept. it probably sounds like it means "having a perfect sense of pitch, musically". but actually it just means knowing what absolute direction the entire song's pitch is rotated, with respect to absolute pitch. which does not really have anything to do with the musical aspect of the music

5.7.23  7:07 pm   What is your opinion on "i'm a huge gamer (most of the time)"?

      looking back, it seems it opened the door for dialogue leading into a music video (song video), and at the same time it seems to have opened the door for scene+character anims in a music video

5.7.23  6:56 pm   Got rejected from art school, what should I do with my life?

      art

5.7.23  6:49 pm   i started using pink noise to quickly get the track levels correct, and seems to help, but the issue now is deciding how each track is supposed to sound on it's own, and that's basically impossible unless i have context, which i can't really have until i balance out the tracks, which i can't really do until i have each track sounding good, which i can't really do without context, which i don't have until i balance out the tracks, which i can't really do without knowing how each track sounds on it'

      i think the pink noise thing might be slightly overhyped

5.7.23  6:14 pm   what made sus chords so suspicious to give them their 'sus' name

      it doesn't mean suspicious. it might mean 'suspended' which makes sense for sus4 but sus2 doesn't really feel suspended. if anything it feels more like a 'substitution'. i'd be ok with calling them sub4 and sub2. but no one calls it that, they call it sus2 and sus4, and that's fine with me. in that sense, sus2 and sus4 are words in their own right. looking back on this whole paragraph, actually i do admit this whole situation is kind of suspicious

5.7.23  5:15 pm   Did you know that Racecar is a palindrome?

      yes. and also, the race car itself is a palindrome, because it can race forwards or backwards

5.7.23  5:13 pm   if you could name a new state, what would you call it

      new america

5.7.23  3:31 pm   how do you feel about the number seventeen?

      it's ok. it's nice that it goes to 102. and the way it does 799 and 901 surrounding 850 is pretty classy too. thanks to 51

5.7.23  3:26 pm   whats your favorite quote.

      "whats your favorite quote."

     the entirety is in the video

      light black

      crazy

      it's ok, i assume

5.7.23  5:10 am   do you ever plan on eliminating the sun?

      no

5.7.23  2:35 am   Why is shakespeare so renown?

      his spelling

5.7.23  2:27 am   So my dream has been crushed and I am working on getting over it. I don't know if you would have advice because it seems like your dreams have come true since you've made a living as a musician and I'm assuming that's what you've wanted to do. But still, do you have something that will help me

      this will help you relate to your other friends on planet #Earth, the dreamcrushing planet. there's a lot of fun to be had here, and actually, there's a lot of dreams to dream. the dreams run stronger, because of all the crushing. it's kind of like a gym membership, .... for dreams

5.6.23  11:50 pm   how to deal with performance anxiety?????? 

      perform more

5.6.23  11:13 pm   i asked a question a long time ago but I forgot what it was, do you have any idea?

      yes, it was probably this

5.6.23  11:10 pm   honestly, how do you answer all these questions without losing your mind?

      i get a new mind each time

5.6.23  10:50 pm   how do you get out of a barren wasteland?

      just go to the next barren wasteland over

5.6.23  9:38 pm   Is cereal considered a soup or vice-versa?

      a pizza, with pineapple on top, is considered cereal

5.6.23  8:05 pm   Did you know that the name Anna is a palindrome? 

      yes

5.6.23  6:19 pm   how long should a road be

      all the way

5.6.23  5:44 pm   what is your opinion on monarchies

      open minded

5.6.23  3:21 pm   Learning all the different chords, their names, and how they play together seems so overwhelming. How do you fit it all into your brain?

      how do you fit all the english words you know, and how to spell them, into your brain?

5.6.23  2:56 pm   what is your opinion on space?

      it's pretty good

5.6.23  1:12 pm   opinion on french

      sometimes i wonder if french speakers pronounce all the silent consonants when clarifying names of things, as a shortcut to not have to spell everything all the time, which would otherwise be necessary

5.6.23  10:45 am   I just read a question from yesterday about the soldiers from i'm a princess, and I'm confused as to why you and your interlocutor are detecting incompleteness. The lyrics go: all the soldiers that surround me and make sure i'm lonely / through the daydream
/ dreamed that it's ok. So isn't dreamed that it's ok the verb phrase attached to the soldiers? It seems like a complete sentence to me.

      grammatically yes, it could seem that the soldiers are doing the dream. but the way i feel it, the "dreamed that it's ok" is definitely supposed to be attached to the narrative singer, which therefore assumes a ghosted "i" and also the previous grammatic problem discussed earlier

5.6.23  10:42 am   In "I'm a Princess" there's this really cool moment after the line "I don't know what we're here for" where the music kinda changes rhythms and goes off track but then returns to the previous motif in the song (sorry not a musician but hopefully u know what I mean). To me this moment feels symbolic. In the previous lyrics you started questioning your place in the world completely unironically, basically taking off the silly mask you often wear in your music. So that musical moment following it almost feels to me like you're putting the mask back on? Like, the mood got too dark and you lost control of the song, and now you're wrenching control back and making it silly again. Was that interpretation at all intentional or am I crazy?

      that's a perfectly fine interpretation, but i wasn't thinking of it that way. i was just doing songwriting

5.6.23  9:16 am   Have you played Mario?

     there might be 100 different mario games. but i have played some of them

     If you have, how do you feel about measures 5-6 of the original Underground Theme, i.e. the melodies and chords - they seem to make very little sense. Your thoughts?

     i'm assuming you are talking about the bass based theme, originating in "super mario brothers" for NES, and replicated across the majority of the mario franchise for the underground themes. the original version has no chords in it, and most versions i've heard do not have chords in it. for the first 4 bars, it seems to vaguely imply C7 and F7, but the part after that seems to not imply any particular chords. it envokes a sense of disoriented burrowing, which does fit the context

5.6.23  6:27 am   did you see me yesterday? i was wearing a t-shirt, walking up the street and was thinking about international waffles

      no

5.6.23  5:19 am   What is your opinion on climbing trees, or being upside down in trees?

      makes sense

5.6.23  2:14 am   what's your favorite brand?

      earth
